name: Choppie
description:
Use arrow keys to move/interact, chop the choppies, unlock secrets, venture down into the deepest depths in search of answers to...something. But beware! Once you enter the caves not even a reset will get you out! (though it may help in a pinch...)

---------------------------------------------------------------

This game uses a heavily edited and hacked version of bitsy 6.2, as well as several bitsy-hecks: end-from-dialog, exit-from-dialog, transparent-sprites, edit-image-from-dialog, permanent-items, save, and bitsymuse. I am currently re-writing the custom "gravity" hack used in this game, and will submit it to the bitsy-hecks project when it is stable enough for others to use. Feel free to leave a comment if you are interested in how any of the other hacks were achieved :>
